testcase.name: Successful registration with valid details - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I open the VietJet Air website for Registration.......................passed And I navigate to the Registration page.....................................passed When I enter Family Name "Belgaumkar", Given Name "Pooja", Phone "987654321", Birthday "15/06/2002", Email "pooja@testmail.com".passed And I click confirm.........................................................passed Then I should see a success message "Registration successful."..............passed
